exceptions.exn: In environment H3 : forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), iteres A f x n = iteres_0 A f x n H0 : forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), prechain_last A (iteres A f x n) = power (Map A) f x n A : Set T : mEnsemble A f : Map A -> Map A x : Map A n, k : nat H1 : def_ok_app A T f H2 : T ((fix power (A : Set) (f : A -> A) (x : A) (n : nat) {struct n} : A := match n with | 0 => x | S n0 => f (power A f x n0) end) (Map A) f x n) Unable to unify "T ((fix power (A : Set) (f : A -> A) (x : A) (n : nat) {struct n} : A := match n with | 0 => x | S n0 => f (power A f x n0) end) (Map A) f x n)" with "T ((fix power (A : Set) (f : A -> A) (x : A) (n : nat) {struct n} : A := match n with | 0 => x | S n0 => f (power A f x n0) end) (Map A) f x (n + k))".
